short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tangent removes the need to maintain multiple browser windows and reduces tab clutter.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tangent removes the need to maintain multiple browser windows and reduce tab clutter. Use Tangent to save your place in your browser and recall all your tabs when you’re ready to work on them again. 

You work on multiple projects every day, you just don't think of them that way. Work, Research, Social Networking, Streaming, Blogging, and other tasks are all separate projects. Tangent helps you save each of those projects so you can pick up where you left off at any time. 

FEATURES 
• Quickly clean up and save groups of tabs
• Never lose your place in groups of tabs or projects
• Access your tabs from any laptop/computer device
• Track an unlimited number of projects  
• Open a new tab to quickly access your most recently used projects 


WHAT'S NEW 

v1.73
• Fixed bug that would caused a delay in showing the menu after clicking the browser action.
• Projects are now deleted with the red trash icon.

v1.7
• Reminders added. Now you can snooze a project for a later time.
• Favorites added. Now you can keep your most important projects upfront and center.

v1.68
• Notifications Added
• Fixed project name bug
• Background is now optional (go to Extensions and click 'options' under Tangent)
• Forgot password function added
• Shift click to select multiple tabs in 'Move Tabs'
• Fixed pop-up project name bug

HELP & SUGGESTIONS  
We're hacking away, making Tangent better each day. We'd love to hear your suggestions.

Contact us at: listening@dotangent.com
